WAL 4h,4i,4j,j,4o
EXT 7,5 d 7,12
EXT 7,15 b 8,5
PAL 2

ROOM d

POS f 4,11

DLG a
I found the journal of my grand father in the attic. Most of the pages were destroyed across ages, but one remains : 'I remember that day, it was the first time I saw a turltle on the beach, and it talked to me....' the end of text is fadded.

DLG b
-> Beach

DLG c
It's a little rabbit!

DLG d
It's a little rabbit!

DLG e
-Hello Human, what a good day, doesn't it? Did I met you before? You looks familiar. Maybe it's just me. But since you're here, I'm sure you can help me. Can you go to the north and scare the seagul? I like to rest in that part of the beach. I will reward you.

DLG f
It's a seagul. You scared him

DLG g
Thank you! Come closer, I will reveal you how to access to the palace under the sea.Touch the three coconuts,  the south one, the north one and the last one.And after that, only the flame will show you the path, a cross will show you the light. 

DLG p


DLG q
Hello Human. If you're here, it means one of friends let you know how to access to our palace. You can rest here a little bit, and when you will want to go back home, take the package on the table and choose the door on the left.The right door is forbidden for your people.

DLG r
It's the gift from the turtle people, you should take it.

END 0
It's good to be home. What an adventure. I should pack some food next time and explore this place in a better way.... But Why the other door was forbidden?

END undefined
It's a newspapper. You pick it up and start reading. According to the publication date...80 years have passed since the day i met this turtle on the beach....

END undefinee


END undefinef


END undefineg
